titleStmt.title: London drollery, or, The wits academy being a select collection of the newest songs, lampoons, and airs alamode : with several other most ingenious peices [sic] of railery, never before published / by W.H.
titleStmt.author: Hicks, William, fl. 1671.

notesStmt.note: Contains poems by Hicks and others.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
